Career Centre

The Career Center is a place where experienced specialists help students and graduates find internships or jobs, prepare for job interviews or simply provide support in matters related to the labor market.

The area of our activities also includes the organization of workshops and events in cooperation with employers, including AGH Career Days (autumn) and, above all, the organization of one of the largest job fairs in Poland, the AGH Job Fair, which is held once a year in the spring.

On a daily basis, we also administer the central CK JobTeaser portal containing job and internship offers aimed at students and graduates.

In our channels, we provide information about internship programs, courses, events and all professional development initiatives aimed at people starting their careers.

You can browse the database of job and internship offers for AGH students and graduates by logging in to the CK JobTeaser service.

Log-in to JobTeaser

Make an appointment for career related consultations conducted by specialists from the AGH Career Centre. The meetings (offline or online) are individual and free of charge for present and prospective university students and graduates.
